mapper.insert: insert into student_completed_course (student_id, course_id, completed_at) values (#{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{completedAt})
mapper.select: select scc.id, scc.student_id, scc.course_id, scc.completed_at, course.college_id, course.speciality_id, course.is_general, course.name as course_name, teacher.name as teacher_name, college.name as college_name, speciality.name as speciality_name, course.credit from student_completed_course scc left join course on scc.course_id = course.id left join teacher on course.teacher_id = teacher.id left join college on course.college_id = college.id left join speciality on course.speciality_id = speciality.id where scc.student_id = #{studentId} order by scc.completed_at desc, scc.id desc
